title: External
content:
From SmartWiki
 Jump to: 
navigation
, 
search
Companies
 and 
contacts
 that are associated with the organization that is licensed to use 
SmartSimple
 but are not part of that organization.
 
Contacts
 are always externally associated, and are not considered 
users
 until they are 
activated
 as such.
 Some common 
roles
 for external users might include: Donor, Organization Contact, External Individual, etc. 
 An easy way to think of the 
external 
user is that they are 
receiving 
something from the 
root organization
: for example, external applicants to a grant would be receiving money. 
In the 
organization hierarchy
, external companies and contacts are listed under the second tab.
Note
: 
A user can either be internal or external; they cannot be transferred nor hold both internal and external access at once.
See Also
